name: navai-voice
description: Monorepo for Navai voice backend library and web playground

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @navai/voice-backend && npm run build --workspace @navai/voice-frontend && npm run build --workspace @navai/voice-mobile && npm run build --workspace @navai/playground-api && npm run build --workspace @navai/playground-web
scripts.dev: npm run build --workspace @navai/voice-backend && npm run build --workspace @navai/voice-frontend && npm run build --workspace @navai/voice-mobile && concurrently -n api,web "npm run dev --workspace @navai/playground-api" "npm run dev --workspace @navai/playground-web"
scripts.dev:mobile: npm run build --workspace @navai/voice-backend && npm run build --workspace @navai/voice-mobile && concurrently -n api,mobile "npm run dev --workspace @navai/playground-api" "npm run dev --workspace @navai/playground-mobile"
scripts.typecheck: npm run build --workspace @navai/voice-backend && npm run build --workspace @navai/voice-frontend && npm run build --workspace @navai/voice-mobile && npm run typecheck --workspace @navai/voice-backend && npm run typecheck --workspace @navai/voice-frontend && npm run typecheck --workspace @navai/voice-mobile && npm run typecheck --workspace @navai/playground-api && npm run typecheck --workspace @navai/playground-web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace @navai/voice-backend && npm run lint --workspace @navai/voice-frontend && npm run lint --workspace @navai/voice-mobile && npm run lint --workspace @navai/playground-api && npm run lint --workspace @navai/playground-web
